bibl.title: Numismatic Report.
bibl.note: Analyzes a group of 12 coins (1 silver, 11 bronze) from the Ptolemaic period and the final days of the temple of the Ram (Vth century A.D.).
bibl.seg: Donald REDFORD (Ed.), Delta Reports (Research in Lower Egypt). The Akhenaten Temple Project. The Pennsylvania State University. Volume I (Oxford - Oakville, 2009) pp. 59-63, 8 reproductions de monnaies.
Analyzes a group of 12 coins (1 silver, 11 bronze) from the Ptolemaic period and the final days of the temple of the Ram (Vth century A.D.).
